article_title: Brothers involved in shooting both sentenced to prison
article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. og.description: Two brothers were each sentenced to 8 1/2 years in state prison on Thursday in Yuma County Superior Court for their roles in a shooting last year at a Yuma apartment complex in which another 30-year-old man was seriously wounded.
